long_description: The Veho Muvi HD waterproof case envelops any Muvi HD7, HD 10, HD Pro or HD Gumball camcorder in a tough and watertight second skin that helps keep it safe no matter what the conditions. Durable polycarbonate case features an external button that lets you start and stop recording. Quick-release mechanism, lanyard leash loop and standard tripod mount offer ease of use and versatility. Comes with a crocodile clip, universal helmet/body strap, lanyard and Allen key tool. The Veho Muvi HD waterproof case is waterproof to 60m (195 ft.).
short_description: The Veho Muvi HD waterproof case envelops any Muvi HD7, HD 10, HD Pro or HD Gumball camcorder in a tough and watertight second skin that helps keep it safe no matter what the conditions.
